entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot use Assert.Equals due to unmanaged constraint in Visual Basic #75063
    .NET 10
  • Should Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild be exposing MSBuild references? #75058
  • Warning CS0420 missing exemption for Volatile class #75055
  • Japanese Translation Issues in “Naming style" Sample. #75051

Closed

  • 👉 Comprar Diploma Superior Original #75062
  • 👉 Comprar Diploma Superior Reconhecido pelo MEC #75061
  • Formatting within `#if #else #endif` Statements #75054
  • Inconsistent report of CS8156 when using generically constrained interfaces and [UnscopedRef] #74785
    17.12
  • Stack overflow when handling chained/nested else-if #75043
  • Can't suppress NRT warnings on ternary with refs #73928
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • BindAttributeCore - use proper binder to avoid an attribute binding cycle #75060
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to new VMR control set #75056
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix SyntaxFactory.XmlSeeAlsoElement href overloads #75052
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix typo in RequestTelemetryLogger.UpdateTelemetryData #75050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable NuGet audit #75049
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • docs: Correct SDK version in documentation to match global.json #75038
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add a test observing lack of an issue. #75057
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Configure release/vscode branch for nuget publishing #75059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix preview refresh on selection for enum flags checkboxes #75053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Cherry pick changes to vscode release #75047
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove MS.CA.Test.Resources.Proprietary PackageReference #75037
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support for per-file content exclusion in Rename Suggestions #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix stack adjustment when emitting stackalloc #75042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
